resources.string:
In this game, you will see a series of faces one at a time.
Touch the screen when you see a certain
 kind of facial expression, but to
 do Not touch at other times. 

 Touch the screen to continue.

Across the game, the rules on what facial 
expression or emotion to respond to will 
change, and an instruction screen
 will tell you the new rules.

 Touch the screen to see the first instruction
 and start a practice session.

Across the task, the rules on what facial expression or emotion to respond to will change,
 and an instruction screen will tell you the new rules.

 Touch the screen to see the first instruction and start a trial session.

Touch the SCREEN whenever you see the 
 %s faces. Do not touch the screen for
 other faces, only the %s faces. 
 Remember to go as fast as you can 
 without making any mistakes. 

 Touch the screen to start.
The game is about to start!!
The test is about to start \n\n Touch the screen to start.
Thank You!! \n\n Touch the screen to exit.
